nodes.text: A net gun was a device that fired compressed nets, either chemical or fiber based.

Chemical-based net guns sprayed out a net of a sticky substance, similar in fashion to Stokhli spray sticks. These chemical-based net guns could be deployed handheld or on a walker, like on All Terrain Kashyyyk Transports.
Fiber-based net guns, such as the Conner Ship Systems APNG3 or the Razor net, fired a compressed fiber net, which was capable of capturing targets lethally or nonlethally.
